synthesis_conditions.equipment: MARS microwave (CEM Corp.) inside 100 cm3 Teflon-lined Easy-Prep reaction vessels
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: brief (3 x 20 s) cycles of sonication in fresh H2O (20 cm3), followed by decanting of the cloudy supernatant
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: evaporated to dryness in air, then dried further under vacuum at 50-60 88C for at least 2 h

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: brief (3 x 20 s) cycles of sonication in fresh H2O (20 cm3), followed by decanting of the cloudy supernatant
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: evaporated to dryness in air, then dried further under vacuum at 50-60 88C for at least 2 h

synthesis_conditions.dehydration_method: evacuated to dryness in air, then dried further under vacuum
synthesis_conditions.solvent_loading_method: Small quantities (5-10 mg) of dehydrated material were transferred to scintillation vials under nitrogen and covered with the pre-dried solvent. The crystals were left to stand for two days before analysis.
